## DpapiBackend class

Windows DPAPI secret backend.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class DpapiBackend implements SecretBackend 
```
**Implements:** [SecretBackend](./vaultkeeper.secretbackend.md)

## Remarks

Only available on Windows. Uses PowerShell with \[System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData\] to encrypt/decrypt secrets. Encrypted blobs are stored in \~/.vaultkeeper/dpapi/.
